controls.caption: Y-size (height)

controls.description:
Coordinates of some rectangle in the matrix. This function fills this rectangle in a copy of ths source matrix and finds the main boundary, containing this rectangle. Then it fills it and/or clears all outside it.
Note: it x-size=0 or y-size=0, this functions is equivalent to  "Fill main boundary around point" for the start point.

controls.caption: What to do with the found main boundary?
controls.name: mode

items.caption: fill all elements inside the boundary with 1
clear all elements outside the boundary to 0
fill all inside with 1 + clear all outside to 0
